artist: Utagawa Hiroshige Published by Fujiokaya Hikotarō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: The customer seated on the left who is playing the popular parlor game <I>ken<I> with a woman is believed to be Hiroshige himself, which indicates that he was also an elite, actively going to famous restaurants as well.
title: Ushijima: Musashiya Restaurant
